title.rendered: First look of Rashmika Mandanna in “Pushpa: The Rule” revealed

content.rendered:
Mythri Movie Makers, the studio behind the much-anticipated film ‘Pushpa: The Rule‘, has unveiled a brand new poster on the occasion of actress Rashmika Mandanna’s birthday. The poster features Rashmika Srivalli’s sought-after style in a silk and gold saree. In the image, Rashmika Mandanna is seen in a bright green silk saree, embellished with multiple necklaces. displaying an enigmatic expression in what looks like a scene from a musical series.

The release of the poster created excitement among the actors of the film, with one Twitter user writing, “Srivalli is interesting and different from Pushpa’s earlier part. @iamRashmika mom. I’m eagerly waiting for the April 8 teaser.”

On the occasion of Rashmika’s birthday, fans sent heartfelt messages, wishing her success in her future endeavours. A fan said, “Wishing a beautiful actress @iamRashmika ma’am again you will get great success in the coming days. May God bless you with good health, peace and happiness forever.”

Set for theatrical release on August 15, 2024, ‘Pushpa: The Rule’ also stars Fahadh Faasil along with Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna. The film teaser will be released on April 8, which is Allu Arjun’s birthday. Girlfriend poster featuring Rashmika Mandanna is out
Meanwhile, two new posters of Rashmika Mandanna’s upcoming film ‘The Girlfriend’ have been released on the occasion of her 28th birthday.

Read Also: Akshay Kumar’s Advice To Tiger Shroff About ‘Disha’ Goes Viral
